original: 廣漢德陽人，為王上之妻，王上死後，父母迫其改嫁張奉，她不願接受，甚至計畫殺害張奉，最後因顧慮父母，選擇自殺。
text: A native of Deyang, Guanghan, was the wife of Wang Shang. After Wang Shang died, her parents forced her to remarry Zhang Feng. She was unwilling to accept it and even planned to kill Zhang Feng. In the end, she chose to commit suicide because of concerns about her parents.
